## Project Overview
This project aimed to modernize an existing design by enhancing its appearance and implementing mechanical improvements for better functionality. 

### Key Features
* **Brushless Motor:** Quieter and more powerful.
* **Balanced Weight:** Reduced wrist strain during long mixing sessions.
* **Digital Display:** Accurate speed control.
